about_the_game:
*NOTE* This pack is available in the in-game store under the Marketplace tab. You are strongly recommended to find the product there and make your purchase from within the game.

The Construction Scenery Pack contains a selection of items that are themed around construction. Whether you want to create whole new construction sites on your routes or scenarios, or whether you want to augment existing scenes with aspects of construction such as fencing, cement mixers in the garden and so forth, there's something in this pack to help you.

A complete list of the items in this pack is as follows:

  • MP00 Cable Drum
  • MP00 Cement Mixer
  • MP00 Construction Building 1
  • MP00 Construction Building 2
  • MP00 Construction Building 3
  • MP00 Construction Building 4
  • MP00 Construction Building 5
  • MP00 Construction Shell 3x3
  • MP00 Construction Shell
  • MP00 Construction Sign 1
  • MP00 Construction Sign 2
  • MP00 Construction Sign 3
  • MP00 Construction Sign 4
  • MP00 Dumpster
  • MP00 Mesh Fence 1
  • MP00 Mesh Fence 2
  • MP00 Mesh Fence 50M
  • MP00 Pallet Bare
  • MP00 Pallet Bricks
  • MP00 Portacabin
  • MP00 Scaffolding 3X4
  • MP00 Scaffolding Roof Topper
  • MP00 Scaffolding Single
  • MP00 Sleeper Pile
  • MP00 Steel Girder
  • MP00 Terrain Flat
  • MP00 Terrain Small
  • MP00 Terrain Medium
  • MP00 Terrain Large
  • MP00 Traffic Cone
  • MP00 Traffic Cones 20m

name: Construction Scenery Pack

subs.option_text: TS Marketplace: Construction Scenery Pack - $4.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Core 2 Duo (3.2 GHz Core 2 Duo recommended), AMD Athlon MP (multiprocessor variant or comparable processors)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB with Pixel Shader 3.0 (AGP PCIe only)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos

short_description: *NOTE* This pack is available in the in-game store under the Marketplace tab. You are strongly recommended to find the product there and make your purchase from within the game.The Construction Scenery Pack contains a selection of items that are themed around construction.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian
